title: Disdain and Deception: A Pride and Prejudice Variation
description: Mr. Darcy and Elizabeth Bennet, as well as Mr. Bingley and Jane Bennet, are engaged! Now that our happy couples are past the misunderstandings and soon to be married, what could possibly go wrong? Not everyone is happy about one couple’s upcoming nuptials. What at first appears to be an accident may have been intentional. And an injured Mr. Darcy finds himself confined in the last place he wants to away from his beloved Elizabeth. Elizabeth Bennet hasn't received any communication from Mr. Darcy since he was taken away from her. She is determined to do whatever it takes to reunite with him, even if it takes deception on her part against those who have disdain for her. But who is behind Mr. Darcy’s “accident”, and will they succeed in separating our dear couple? See Elizabeth Bennet as you’ve never seen her before, in Disdain and Deception!
author: Denise O'Hara
